content: decrease x 1 single_crochet x 2 x 4 single_crochet decrease x round 11-12 single_crochet x 28 28 ​ ​ 1 single_crochet x 1 14 round 13 single_crochet decrease x 1 single_crochet x 2 x 7 21 ​ round 14-20 single_crochet x 14 14 ​ round 14-16 single_crochet x 21 21 ​ stuff arms fold edges together and single_crochet across round 17 single_crochet decrease x 1 single_crochet x 1 x 7 14 row finish off leaving a long tail for attaching ​ round 18-30 single_crochet x 14 14 to blanket ​ do not stuff fold edges together and single_crochet across row finish off leaving a long tail for assembly attaching to head create your blanket using the pattern of ears are attached on either side of the head your choice the average size for most between rounds 7-8 reference b lovey blankets will be between 17 and 19 inches across depending on what pattern you are using as well as the final look you are going for attach arms and head securely to blanket and weave in all ends 2 yarn used ● blanket/bow i love this yarn - city beat i love this yarn - light peach ​ ● head/ears/arms i love this yarn - grey beard ​ ● embroidery thread light peach ​ ● blanket pattern used rainbow ripple baby blanket by celeste young ​ ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/victoria-stewart ​ website https //onceuponahookcrochet com/ ​ facebook https //www facebook com/onceuponahookcrochet/ ​ instagram https //www instagram com/onceuponahookcrochet/ ​ email onceuponahookcrochet vs@gmail com ​ copyright notice you have permission to sell finished products for this pattern if you choose to ​ sell i would love for you to include a link to my pattern the pattern and images contained in this file are copyright protected rewriting reselling distributing or copying the pattern or using the images to sell your finished items is prohibited thank you for your understanding and cooperation c once upon a hook crochet april 2018 3
